Question: Checked-in luggage ke liye weight aur size limits kya hain?

Question: Cabin baggage me allowed items kya hain?

Question: Airport par security check ka process kya hota hai?

Staff ki instructions strictly follow karein. Airport time par pohanchna aur documents ready rakhna zaruri hai.

Question: Flight ke delay hone par kya steps lene chahiye?

Question: Question
Answer: Answer

Question: Check-in area kahan hai?
Answer: Check-in area departure floor ke main entrance ke foran baad hai. Har airline ka apna counter hota hai jahan staff aapki madad karta hai.

Question: Parking se terminal kaise jaun?
Answer: Parking area se “Departures” ke boards follow karein. Lift aur ramp dono available hain taake aap asani se saman le ja sakein.

Question: Baggage wrapping service kahan milti hai?
Answer: Baggage wrapping service check-in counter ke paas hoti hai. Ye service aapke bag ko flight ke dauran safe rakhti hai.

Question: Information desk kahan hai?
Answer: Information desk entrance ke paas hai jahan staff flights, gates aur facilities ke bare mein madad karta hai.

Question: Trolley kahan se milegi?
Answer: Trolley har entrance aur check-in area ke paas mil jati hai. Ye free hoti hai aur har waqt available rehti hai.

Question: Gate 8 kahan hai?
Answer: Gate 8 security check ke baad right side par hai. Wahan clear boards lage hue hain jo direction batate hain.

Question: Washroom kahan hai?
Answer: Har 2 gates ke darmiyan washroom hai. Gate 3, 6 aur 9 ke paas washrooms sabse qareeb hain.

Question: Lounge available hai?
Answer: Haan, business class aur VIP passengers ke liye lounge hai. Paid entry bhi mil sakti hai agar aap chahen.

Question: Khana kahan milta hai?
Answer: Departure hall mein coffee aur snacks ke liye cafes aur fast food counters available hain. Gloria Jeans aur Cinnabon famous hain.

Question: Namaz kahan par parh sakta hoon?
Answer: Namaz ke liye alag kamra gate 5 ke paas hai. Mardon aur khawateen ke liye alag jagah banai gayi hai.

Question: Security check kahan hota hai?
Answer: Check-in ke baad security area aata hai jahan saman aur ticket dono check kiye jate hain.

Question: Samaan ka weight kahan check hota hai?
Answer: Airline counter par weight machine hoti hai jahan aap apne bags weigh karwa sakte hain.

Question: Wheelchair service milti hai?
Answer: Haan, wheelchair service available hai. Information desk se madad mang sakte hain.

Question: Gate tak kitna time lagta hai?
Answer: Security check ke baad aam tor par gate tak 5 se 10 minutes lagte hain.

Question: Charging point kahan milta hai?
Answer: Har waiting area ke paas charging points aur USB ports lage hue hain.

Question: Free WiFi milta hai?
Answer: Haan, “IIAP-FreeWiFi” network se connect karke free internet use kar sakte hain.

Question: Agar gate change ho jaye to?
Answer: Screen par updated information aati hai aur loudspeaker se announce bhi hoti hai.

Question: Staff madad karta hai?
Answer: Bilkul, airport staff har section mein maujood hota hai madad ke liye.

Question: Shopping kar sakte hain?
Answer: Haan, duty free shops aur gift stores lounges ke andar available hain.

Question: Family andar aa sakti hai?
Answer: Sirf ticket holders andar ja sakte hain. Family farewell area tak aa sakti hai.

Question: Security ke baad wapas ja sakte hain?
Answer: Nahi, security ke baad wapas jana allowed nahi hota.

Question: ATM machine hai?
Answer: Haan, ATM machines main hall aur departure lounge dono jagah par hain.

Question: Bachon ke liye play area hai?
Answer: Haan, gate 7 ke paas chhota play area bana hua hai bachon ke liye.

Question: Pani ki bottle le ja sakta hoon?
Answer: Security ke baad pani le jane ki ijazat nahi hoti. Andar se bottles mil jati hain.

Question: Prayer room mein announcement sunai deti hai?
Answer: Haan, prayer room mein speakers lage hain taake aap announcements miss na karein.

Question: Smoking area hai?
Answer: Haan, gate 10 ke paas smoking zone hai jo ventilated hai.

Question: Immigration process mushkil hai?
Answer: Nahi, staff helpful hai. Passport aur ticket ready rakhein taake process asaan ho.

Question: Shopping available hai?

Question: Medical help mil sakti hai?
Answer: Haan, emergency clinic departure floor par hai jo 24 ghante khula rehta hai.

Question: Charging free hai?

Question: query
Answer: expected_response

Question: Airport mein WiFi ka password kya hai?
Answer: Nahi, Islamabad International Airport ka free WiFi network khula hai aur kisi password ki zaroorat nahi hai. Aap asaani se 'ISB_Airport_Free' network se connect ho sakte hain jo poore terminal mein available hai. Connection ke liye sirf apne device ki WiFi settings kholein, available networks ki list mein ISB_Airport_Free talash karein, aur us se connect hone ke liye us par tap karein. Kuch suratoon mein, aap ko ek saada terms & conditions ke page par bheja ja sakta hai jahan aap ko usage ki shartein qubool karni hongi is se pehle ke internet tak rasai faal ho. Yeh network bunyadi web browsing, email, social media, aur messaging apps ke liye munasib raftaar faraham karta hai. Connection ka waqt aam tor par 3-4 ghantay tak mahfooz rehta hai, phir aap ko dobara connect karna par sakta hai. Agar aap ko connection mein koi masla aata hai, to information desk par madad ke liye poochein jo technical support ya alternative WiFi options faraham kar sakte hain.

Question: Kya airport mein namaz ki jagah hai?
Answer: Ji haan, Islamabad International Airport mein dedicated namaz ke kamray????? hain jo 24/7 khulay hain tamam musalmanon ke liye. Yeh specially designed prayer facilities doosri manzil par Gate 5 ke qareeb waqe hain. Namaz ke kamray alag alag sections mein taqseem hain mardon aur aurton ke liye, har section mein proper wuzu ki suholiyat hai. Har kamra qibla ki taraf rukh kiya gaya hai aur saaf carpet se muffarash hai. Additional amenities mein shamil hain: Quran shareef ki copies, namaz ke mats agar zaroorat ho, clock jis mein namaz ke auqat dikhai dete hain, aur AC ya heating system comfortable temperature ke liye. Wuzu area mein paani ki suholiyat hai aur towels ya tissues available hain. Yeh kamray shanti aur privacy faraham karte hain takay aap apni namaz ada kar sakein. Agar aap ko namaz ke kamray dhoondhne mein mushkil ho rahi hai, to kisi bhi airport staff member se poochein ya signage follow karein jo clearly marked hai.

Question: Kahan se foreign currency exchange kar sakta hoon?
Answer: Currency exchange counters Islamabad International Airport mein multiple locations par available hain. Main exchange counter arrival hall mein baggage claim area ke qareeb waqe hai jahan international passengers apna foreign currency Pakistani Rupees mein convert kar sakte hain. Departure terminal mein bhi currency exchange services hain security checkpoint se pehle aur baad mein dono jagah. Yeh counters aam tor par subah 6 bajay se raat 11 bajay tak khulay rehtay hain, lekin timings flight schedules ke mutabiq badal sakti hain. Exchange rates market rates ke qareeb hote hain lekin thoda commission charge kiya jata hai. Commonly exchanged currencies mein shamil hain: US Dollar, Euro, British Pound, Saudi Riyal, UAE Dirham, aur doosri major currencies. Exchange karte waqt apna passport lana na bhoolein kyunki identification zaruri hai khas tor par bara amounts ke liye. Rates ka comparison karne ke liye, aap exchange counter par pehle rates pooch sakte hain aur decision le sakte hain. Pakistani Rupees ko foreign currency mein wapas badalna bhi mumkin hai, lekin is ke liye original exchange receipt zaruri ho sakti hai.

Question: Airport lounge mein kaise ja sakte hain?
Answer: Islamabad International Airport mein premium lounges tak rasai hasil karne ke kai tariqay hain. Gate 7 ke qareeb waqe main lounge entry ke liye yeh options hain: Business ya First Class ticket holders automatically qualified hain airport lounges ke liye, frequent flyer program ke elite members jo qualifying status rakhte hain free access hasil kar sakte hain, Priority Pass membership holders apna card dikha kar enter ho sakte hain, aur day passes airport par hi purchase kiye ja sakte hain agar seats available hon. Day pass ka kharcha aam tor par PKR 3,000-5,000 ke darmiyan hota hai per person. Lounge facilities mein yeh shamil hain: complimentary food aur beverages including hot meals, snacks, tea, coffee, aur soft drinks, comfortable seating arrangements, free high-speed WiFi, business center with computers aur printing facilities, shower facilities, TV aur entertainment options, aur newspapers aur magazines. Lounge mein reh kar aap ek shanti aur aram deh mahol mein apne flight ka intezar kar sakte hain door from the crowded terminal. Kuch credit cards bhi lounge access provide karte hain, to apne card benefits check karein.

Question: Kya mobile phone charging stations hain?
Answer: Ji haan, Islamabad International Airport mein multiple mobile phone charging stations aur facilities available hain poore terminal mein. Free charging stations kai locations par installed hain including: gate seating areas mein jahan dedicated charging kiosks hain multiple USB ports aur power outlets ke saath, food court area mein jahan tables ke qareeb outlets hain, waiting lounges mein, aur main departure hall mein. Kai modern seating areas mein built-in USB ports aur power sockets directly chairs mein hi embedded hain, jo convenient charging ko bahut asaan banate hain. Premium lounges mein wireless charging pads aur zyada charging stations available hain. Agar aap ko charging cable chahiye, kuch convenience stores airport mein charging cables aur portable power banks bhi frokhaat karte hain. Meherbani kar ke dhyan rakhein ke apne devices ko charging stations par unattended na chhodein kyunki theft ho sakti hai. Apne phone par nazar rakhein ya usse pocket mein rakhen jab charge ho raha ho. Agar sabhi charging stations busy hain, to aap restaurants ya cafes mein bhi outlets use kar sakte hain apne khane ke sath.

Question: Airport mein ATM machine kahan hai?
Answer: ATM machines Islamabad International Airport mein kai locations par available hain convenience ke liye. Aap ko ATMs milenge: main entrance ke qareeb arrival aur departure areas mein, food court ke vicinity mein jahan log shopping ya khana khaate waqt cash ki zaroorat mehsoos karte hain, aur central departure hall mein security checkpoint se pehle. Yeh ATMs Pakistan ke major banks dwara operate kiye jate hain jaise Habib Bank Limited (HBL), National Bank of Pakistan, MCB, aur Allied Bank. ATMs se aap: Pakistani Rupees withdraw kar sakte hain, account balance check kar sakte hain, aur basic banking transactions perform kar sakte hain. Domestic cards ke liye, yeh services aam tor par free ya minimal fee ke sath hain. International card holders (Visa, Mastercard, American Express, Union Pay) bhi in ATMs se withdrawal kar sakte hain, lekin foreign transaction fees apply ho sakti hain jo aap ke home bank dwara charge ki jati hain. Withdrawal limits typically PKR 25,000-50,000 per transaction hain, jo aap ke bank aur card type par depend karta hai. Security ke liye, ATMs CCTV surveillance ke nichay hain aur 24/7 available hain.

Question: Kya wheelchair service available hai?
Answer: Ji haan, bilkul! Wheelchair service Islamabad International Airport par free of charge available hai tamam passengers ke liye jo mobility assistance chahte hain. Yeh service available hai for: elderly passengers, disabled travelers, passengers with temporary injuries, aur koi bhi jo walking mein difficulty mehsoos karta ho. Wheelchair request karne ke liye: advance mein apni airline ko inform karein booking ke waqt ya kam az kam 48 ghantay flight se pehle, ya arrival par airport ke information desk par request karein jo immediately arrange kar dein ge. Trained staff members wheelchair push karte hain aur passengers ko: entry se check-in counter tak, security screening tak, boarding gate tak, aur zaroorat parne par aircraft door tak assist karte hain. Service arrival par bhi available hai aircraft se baggage claim aur exit tak. Additional assistance jaise ke boarding/de-boarding ke liye special equipment bhi request ki ja sakti hai agar severe mobility issues hain. Yeh tamam services free hain, lekin agar aap chahain to staff member ko tip de sakte hain appreciation ke tor par. Service high season ya busy times mein thodi delay ho sakti hai, isliye advance request ki tavsiya di jati hai.

Question: Airport mein first aid ya medical facility kahan hai?
Answer: Islamabad International Airport mein comprehensive medical center Gate 2 ke qareeb waqe hai jo 24/7 khula rehta hai. Yeh fully equipped medical facility emergency situations aur routine medical needs dono ko handle karti hai. Medical center mein available services: qualified doctors aur paramedics jo immediate medical attention provide karte hain, basic medical equipment jaise blood pressure monitors, thermometers, aur first aid supplies, emergency medications ka stock, minor injury treatment jaise cuts, bruises, sprains, illness evaluation aur initial treatment, aur ambulance services ka immediate contact serious emergencies ke liye. Common situations jahan passengers medical center ka rujoo karte hain: travel sickness, headaches ya fever, blood pressure issues, diabetic emergencies, minor accidents ya falls, allergic reactions, aur anxiety ya panic attacks. Medical staff multilingual hai aur Urdu, English, aur kuch regional languages bol sakta hai. Service basic consultation ke liye aam tor par free hai, lekin medications ya specialized treatment ke liye charge ho sakta hai. Agar aap ko chronic medical condition hai aur regular medications lete hain, to apni medicines carry through karna na bhoolein with proper prescriptions. Airport security aur information desk staff basic first aid mein bhi trained hain aur immediate help provide kar sakte hain medical center tak pahunchne tak.

Question: Kya bachon ke liye play area hai?
Answer: Ji haan, Islamabad International Airport mein dedicated kids play area hai jo Gate 5 ke qareeb waqe hai specifically 2-10 saal ke bachon ke liye designed. Yeh bright aur colorful play zone safe aur entertaining environment provide karta hai families ke liye jo apni flight ka intezar kar rahe hain. Play area mein included hain: climbing structures jo age-appropriate aur safe hain, slides aur tunnels exploration ke liye, interactive games aur activities jo cognitive development ko promote karti hain, soft play equipment chhote bachon ke liye, aur seating area parents ke liye jahan wo apne bachon par nazar rakh sakte hain. Safety features include: padded flooring cushioning falls ke liye, rounded edges tamam equipment par, regular cleaning aur sanitization, aur security staff ki presence area ke qareeb. Play area usually 6 AM se 10 PM tak khula rehta hai, lekin hours vary kar sakte hain. Area mein entry free hai aur no reservation required. Parents ya guardians ka supervision zaruri hai bachon ke sath. Busy times par, especially weekends ya holidays par, area crowded ho sakta hai to off-peak hours mein jana better experience de sakta hai. Adjacent area mein benches aur charging points bhi hain parents ke liye. Agar aap ka bacha restless ho raha hai long wait ke doran, yeh play area perfect solution hai unhe entertain karne ka.

Question: Restroom facilities kahan hain?
Answer: Restrooms (washrooms/toilets) Islamabad International Airport ke poore terminal mein conveniently located hain aur clearly marked signage ke sath. Aap ko restrooms milenge: har gate area ke qareeb takay passengers jaldi access kar sakein, food court aur dining areas ke vicinity mein, main departure aur arrival halls mein, aur security checkpoint se pehle aur baad mein. Facilities include: separate men's aur women's restrooms, family restrooms jo spacious hain aur parents ko chhote bachon ke sath accommodate karte hain baby changing stations ke sath, accessible restrooms specially designed for disabled passengers with wheelchair-friendly stalls, prayer/ablution facilities kuch washrooms mein Muslim passengers ke liye, aur regular cleaning aur maintenance jo hygiene ensure karta hai. Restrooms mein available amenities: flush toilets (mostly western style, kuch squat toilets bhi), wash basins with running water, soap dispensers, hand dryers ya paper towels, aur mirrors. Peak hours mein restrooms busy ho sakte hain, to agar time hai to less crowded areas mein washrooms try karein. Agar koi maintenance issue hai ya cleanliness concern, to nearest information desk ya staff member ko inform karein. Signage follow karein jo restrooms ki direction indicate karta hai - usually male symbol for men, female symbol for women, aur wheelchair symbol for accessible facilities.

Question: Kya airport mein baby changing station hai?
Answer: Ji haan bilkul, Islamabad International Airport mein dedicated baby changing facilities available hain families ke liye. Gate 3 ke qareeb specially designed mother and baby room hai jo private aur comfortable space provide karta hai. Is room mein included hain: clean aur hygienic changing tables jo safe height par installed hain, disposable changing mats jo agar available hon, diaper disposal bins, wash basin with warm water, aur comfortable seating area for nursing mothers. Additionally, family restrooms poore terminal mein available hain jo bhi changing tables equipped hain. Yeh family washrooms extra spacious hain takay parents strollers ya wheelchairs ke sath easily maneuver kar sakein. Baby changing facilities mein basic amenities hain lekin apni own diapers, wipes, aur baby care products lana recommended hai kyunki airport mein yeh consistently available nahi ho sakte. Kuch convenience stores aur pharmacies terminal mein emergency baby supplies bechte hain agar zaroorat parre. Staff members bhi helpful hain aur agar aap ko baby facilities dhoondhne mein help chahiye to information desk se guide kar sakta hai. Mother and baby room mein nursing area bhi hai complete privacy ke liye. Room clean aur well-maintained hai aur regular monitoring hoti hai hygiene ensure karne ke liye.

Question: Airport par lost and found office kahan hai?
Answer: Lost and Found office Islamabad International Airport mein main departure hall ke ground floor par waqe hai, usually information desk ke qareeb. Agar aap ne koi item khoya hai airport mein ya aap ko kisi ki chhuti hui cheez mili hai, yeh office aap ki madad kar sakta hai. Services include: khoyi hui items ko report karna aur database mein register karana, found items ko claim karna proper identification ke sath, temporary storage for lost items for a certain period (usually 30-90 days), aur coordination with airlines for items left on aircraft. Common lost items include: mobile phones, wallets, passports, laptops, bags, jewelry, aur personal documents. Agar aap ne airport mein kuch khoya hai: immediately Lost and Found office ko inform karein with detailed description, item ki purchase receipt ya unique features batayein jo ownership prove karein, contact information de dein takay office aap ko inform kar sake agar item mil jaye, aur regular follow-up karein. Items claim karte waqt valid identification zaruri hai. Agar item valuable hai jaise passport ya travel documents, to immigration aur airline ko bhi inform karein. Lost and Found office ke working hours typically 8 AM se 8 PM tak hain, lekin emergency situations mein airport security bhi assist kar sakta hai. Phone contact bhi available hai inquiries ke liye. Unclaimed items ek specific period ke baad auction ya charity ko donate kar di jati hain.

Question: Kya smoking area airport mein hai?
Answer: Islamabad International Airport ka poora indoor terminal completely smoke-free hai Pakistani law aur aviation regulations ke mutabiq. Cigarette smoking, e-cigarettes, aur vaping devices terminal ke andar strictly prohibited hain. Sirf ek designated smoking area hai jo terminal ke bahar outdoor space mein waqe hai, jo security checkpoint ke baad accessible hai. Yeh outdoor smoking zone clearly marked hai with signage aur specific location par accessible hai. Smoking area mein basic facilities jaise ashtrays aur sitting arrangement ho sakte hain. Important points: agar aap smoking area jana chahte hain security ke baad, to aap ko dobara security screening se guzarna pare ga agar aap wapas terminal mein aana chahte hain, to time accordingly plan karein especially agar flight jaldi hai, tobacco products duty-free shops se purchase kiye ja sakte hain lekin unhe international flights par le jana restrictions ke sath ho sakta hai, aur terminal ke andar smoking ke serious consequences hain including heavy fines aur potential legal action. Agar aap smoker hain, to flight se pehle smoking area use karne ka plan banayein aur apne boarding time ka dhyan rakhein. Nicotine patches ya gum bhi available hain pharmacy se jo long flights ke doran madad kar sakte hain. Airport staff smoking rules ko strictly enforce karta hai passenger aur staff safety ke liye.

Question: Information desk kahan milegi?
Answer: Information desks Islamabad International Airport mein multiple strategic locations par available hain takay passengers easily help access kar sakein. Main information desk central departure hall mein waqe hai jahan easily visible signage hai. Additional information points hain: arrival hall mein international passengers ke liye, security checkpoint ke qareeb, aur some gate areas mein. Information desk staff multilingual hai aur English, Urdu, aur regional languages mein communicate kar sakta hai. Services provided include: general airport information jaise terminal layout, gate locations, facility directions, flight information aur updates about delays, cancellations, ya gate changes, lost and found assistance, wheelchair aur special assistance requests, directions to restaurants, shops, lounges, aur other facilities, local transportation information jaise taxis, buses, aur car rentals, hotel recommendations aur booking assistance, tourist information about Islamabad aur Pakistan, aur emergency assistance aur coordination with security ya medical services. Staff trained hai handle karne ko various passenger inquiries aur typically friendly aur helpful hai. Agar aap ko kisi bhi facility ya service ke baare mein confusion hai, information desk first point of contact hai. Desk hours usually early morning se late night tak hain flight schedules ke sath align ho kar. Busy times par wait time ho sakta hai, lekin staff quickly assist karne ki koshish karta hai. Free brochures, maps, aur pamphlets bhi information desk par available hain.

Question: Kya airport mein pharmacy hai?
Answer: Ji haan, pharmacy ya medical store Islamabad International Airport ke departure terminal mein available hai jo basic medications aur health products bechti hai. Pharmacy typically Gate 4 ke qareeb location par hai aur convenient hours mein khuli rehti hai usually subah 7 bajay se raat 10 bajay tak, lekin exact timings vary kar sakti hain. Available products mein shamil hain: over-the-counter medications jaise pain relievers (paracetamol, ibuprofen), cold aur flu medicines, antacids for stomach issues, anti-diarrhea medicines, allergy medications (antihistamines), motion sickness tablets, first aid supplies jaise bandages, antiseptic creams, thermometers, basic health monitoring devices jaise BP monitors, personal care items aur hygiene products, vitamins aur supplements, aur limited baby care products jaise formula milk, diapers. Prescription medications limited selection mein available ho sakte hain, lekin better hai ke apni own prescribed medicines carry karein especially chronic conditions ke liye. Pharmacist basic health advice bhi de sakta hai aur suitable over-the-counter options recommend kar sakta hai. Prices airport pharmacy mein city pharmacies se thode zyada ho sakte hain. Agar aap ko specific medication chahiye jo wahan nahi hai, pharmacist alternative suggest kar sakta hai. Travel health essentials jaise jet lag pills, sleep aids, aur digestive enzymes bhi mil sakte hain. Emergency medical situations ke liye, medical center Gate 2 par better option hai jahan doctors available hain.

Question: Airport lounge mein kya kya facilities hain?
Answer: Premium lounge Islamabad International Airport mein comprehensive facilities provide karta hai comfortable aur relaxing experience ke liye. Gate 7 ke qareeb waqe lounge mein yeh amenities included hain: Food aur Beverages - complimentary buffet with hot meals (Pakistani aur international cuisine), variety of snacks jaise samosas, sandwiches, fruits, bakery items, unlimited beverages including tea, coffee, juices, soft drinks, aur kuch lounges mein limited alcoholic beverages bhi; Seating aur Comfort - comfortable recliners aur sofas, quiet zones for rest, individual workstations for business travelers; Technology - free high-speed WiFi throughout lounge, charging stations with multiple ports, business center with computers, printers, photocopiers, aur scanners, international newspapers aur magazines, TV screens with news aur entertainment channels; Washroom Facilities - clean aur well-maintained restrooms, shower facilities with towels aur toiletries, personal grooming products; Additional Services - flight information displays, assistance with rebooking ya inquiries, limited meeting rooms (availability par dependent), aur concierge services. Lounge environment peaceful hai away from crowded terminal. Air conditioning ya heating maintained hai for optimal comfort. Staff attentive hai aur regularly replenish food aur drinks. Some lounges mein spa ya massage chairs bhi ho sakte hain. Access usually 3-4 hours se pehle ki flight ke liye allowed hai. Guest policies vary - kuch lounges allow karte hain additional guests for a fee.

Question: Kya duty free shopping available hai?
Answer: Ji haan bilkul! Duty-free shopping Islamabad International Airport mein international departure area mein available hai security checkpoint ke baad. Duty-free shop mein wide range of products hai discounted prices par kyunki taxes aur duties waived hain international travelers ke liye. Available categories: Perfumes aur Cosmetics - international brands jaise Chanel, Dior, Estee Lauder, MAC, luxury fragrances aur skincare products; Alcohol aur Tobacco - imported wines, spirits, champagne, cigarettes, cigars (restrictions apply based on destination country); Electronics - headphones, cameras, watches, gadgets; Fashion Accessories - branded sunglasses, bags, wallets, scarves; Chocolates aur Confectionery - international brands jaise Toblerone, Lindt, Ferrero Rocher, gift boxes; Local Products - Pakistani handicrafts, traditional items, souvenirs. Shopping karte waqt remember karein: duty-free only international passengers ke liye hai proper boarding pass ke sath, liquid restrictions apply if purchased before security (lekin duty-free se baad mein no problem), destination country ki customs limits check karein especially alcohol aur tobacco ke liye, prices compare karein kyunki kabhi kabhi airport duty-free bhi expensive ho sakta hai regular stores se, aur payment methods include cash (PKR aur major foreign currencies) aur credit/debit cards. Staff multilingual hai aur assist kar sakti hai. Products typically sealed bags mein di jati hain jo flight tak nahi kholni chahiye. Purchase receipts save karein customs declaration ke liye.

Question: Kahan se airport ka map mil sakta hai?
Answer: Airport map ya terminal layout Islamabad International Airport ka kai ways se mil sakta hai: Information Desk - free printed maps available hain jo detailed terminal layout dikhate hain with all facilities marked, yeh maps usually Urdu aur English dono mein hain. Digital Displays - interactive touchscreen kiosks poore terminal mein installed hain jo digital map provide karte hain 'You Are Here' marker ke sath, yeh kiosks allow karte hain ke aap specific facilities search karein aur directions paye. Mobile App - agar airport ka official mobile app hai to download kar ke detailed map aur real-time navigation mil sakti hai. Website - airport ki official website par downloadable PDF maps available hain jo aap print kar sakte hain travel se pehle. Signage - comprehensive directional signage poore terminal mein hai jo major facilities ki taraf guide karta hai including gates, restrooms, food court, lounges. Map features jo typically included hain: gate numbers aur locations, check-in counters, security checkpoints, baggage claim areas, restrooms, prayer rooms, medical center, information desks, restaurants aur cafes, shops aur duty-free, ATMs aur currency exchange, taxi stands aur transportation, parking areas. Maps mein usually color coding hoti hai different zones ke liye aur symbols standardized hote hain. Agar printed map chahiye, to information desk se free copy request karein. Staff bhi verbally directions de sakta hai agar map confusing lag raha ho.

Question: Kya airport mein hotel hai ya nearby?
Answer: Direct airport ke andar hotel nahi hai, lekin Islamabad International Airport ke bahut qareeb multiple hotel options available hain different budget ranges mein. Airport ke vicinity mein hotels: Airport Hotels (walking distance within 5-10 minutes) - usually 3-4 star category with shuttle service, facilities include comfortable rooms, restaurants, WiFi, gym; Mid-range Hotels (2-5 km radius) - affordable options with basic amenities, airport pickup/drop service available; Luxury Hotels (Islamabad city mein, 20-30 km) - 5-star properties with full services agar aap extended stay chahte hain. Hotel booking: advance online booking through websites like Booking.com, Hotels.com, ya direct hotel websites recommended hai, information desk airport par hotel recommendations aur booking assistance provide kar sakta hai, kuch hotels mein airport desk bhi hota hai arrival area mein, taxi drivers bhi hotel suggestions de sakte hain lekin confirm karein ke wo commission base recommendations nahi hain. Hotel amenities typically: free airport shuttle (confirm timing advance mein), 24-hour check-in for late night arrivals, luggage storage agar early check-out ya late flight hai, dining options, meeting rooms for business travelers. Layover passengers: agar aap ka long layover hai (6+ hours), to day-use rooms kuch hotels mein available hain without overnight stay. Prices vary PKR 5,000 se lekar 20,000+ per night tak depending on hotel category aur season. Transit hotels specifically designed for short stays zyada convenient hain.

Question: Food court mein kya options hain?
Answer: Islamabad International Airport ka food court diverse dining options provide karta hai local aur international cuisine ke sath. Food court central location par hai easily accessible sabhi passengers ko. Available dining options: International Fast Food Chains - KFC for fried chicken, Subway for sandwiches aur subs, McDonald's (agar available ho), Pizza Hut for pizzas aur Italian items; Local Pakistani Restaurants - Taste of Pakistan jo authentic Pakistani dishes serve karta hai jaise biryani, karahi, nihari, haleem, various kebabs, traditional breakfast items like paratha aur chanay; Cafes aur Bakeries - Dunkin Donuts, local bakeries with fresh bread, cakes, pastries, cookies; Quick Service - snack bars with samosas, sandwiches, burgers, wraps; Beverages - tea stalls with desi chai, coffee shops, juice bars with fresh fruit juices aur smoothies. Dining considerations: prices airport mein city restaurants se slightly higher hain, operating hours vary but most places open early morning to late night, seating area shared hai with tables aur chairs, payment methods include cash aur cards mostly, halal food standards maintained hain as per Islamic requirements, vegetarian options bhi available hain though limited compared to non-veg. Popular items: for quick bite - samosa, sandwich, burger; for full meal - biryani plate, chicken karahi with naan; for breakfast - paratha with chanay, omelette; for snacks - pakora, french fries, pizza slice; for beverages - chai, coffee, fresh juice. Family dining areas with high chairs for babies bhi available hain. Takeaway bhi possible hai agar aap apne gate par le jana chahte hain. Nutritional information limited hai lekin staff se ingredients ke baare mein pooch sakte hain.

Question: Kya airport mein barber shop ya salon hai?
Answer: Limited grooming services Islamabad International Airport mein available hain. Premium lounge mein basic grooming facilities ho sakti hain like shaving kits, combs, aur mirrors, lekin dedicated full-service barber shop ya beauty salon typically airport terminal mein nahi hai. Alternative options: nearby airport hotels mein salon services available ho sakti hain jo passengers ko accommodate kar sakte hain appointment ke sath, city mein proper salons aur barber shops 20-30 minutes drive par available hain extensive services ke liye, premium lounge mein limited grooming amenities jaise razors, shaving cream, aftershave, hair combs available hain self-service ke liye, pharmacy aur convenience stores personal grooming products bechte hain jaise combs, hair gel, deodorant jo aap quickly use kar sakte hain restroom mein. Typical grooming needs ke liye: clean shave - men's restroom mein aap apna own razor use kar sakte hain, hair fixing - comb aur hair products pharmacy se available hain, makeup - ladies restroom mein proper lighting aur mirrors hain, nail care - limited manicure kits convenience stores mein. Long layovers aur early morning flights ke liye yeh facilities helpful ho sakti hain freshen up karne ke liye. Future mein agar airport expand hota hai to dedicated salon service add ho sakti hai jaise kuch international airports mein hoti hai.

Question: Baggage wrapping service kahan hai?
Answer: Baggage wrapping aur packing services Islamabad International Airport mein check-in counters ke qareeb available hain departure terminal mein. Yeh service aap ki luggage ko protective plastic wrapping mein wrap karti hai additional security aur protection ke liye. Baggage wrapping benefits: protection against scratches, dirt, aur weather damage during handling, tamper deterrent jo unauthorized opening ko prevent karta hai aur aap ko peace of mind deta hai, easier identification kyunki wrapped bags stand out on baggage carousel, leakage prevention agar aap liquids ya fragile items pack kiye hain. Service process: aap apna bag wrapping station par le jayein, staff proper size ki plastic wrap use karega aur machine se tightly wrap karega covering all sides, handles aur wheels usually exposed rahte hain easy handling ke liye, price based on bag size - typically PKR 200-500 per bag, payment cash ya card se kar sakte hain, process quick hai usually 5-10 minutes per bag. When to use: international travel especially to countries jahan baggage handling rough hai, expensive luggage ko protect karne ke liye, bags with multiple pockets jo easily open ho sakte hain, gifts ya fragile items jo extra protection chahte hain. Important: wrapping ke baad agar security random check select karti hai to aap ko wrapping open karni par sakti hai for inspection aur phir rewrap karwani hogi. Wrapping karane se pehle ensure karein ke aap ki baggage properly packed hai aur locked hai. Alternative: aap apna own plastic wrap bhi la sakte hain aur DIY kar sakte hain lekin airport service zyada professional aur secure hai.

Question: Kya airport mein porter service available hai?
Answer: Ji haan, porter services Islamabad International Airport mein available hain jo aap ki heavy luggage carry karne mein madad karte hain. Porters licensed aur uniformed hote hain aur airport ke entrance, arrival area, aur check-in counters ke qareeb readily available hain. Porter assistance useful hai when: aap ke paas multiple heavy bags hain, aap elderly hain ya physical limitations hain, aap children ke sath travel kar rahe hain aur hands full hain, aap time-sensitive situation mein hain aur quickly move karna chahte hain. Porter services include: baggage trolley arrange karna, bags ko entry se check-in counter tak le jana, check-in process mein assistance, check-in se security ya gate tak bags carry karna arrival par, bags ko aircraft se baggage claim tak track karna aur collect karna, baggage claim se taxi stand ya pickup point tak transport. Porter fees: officially set rates hain but typically PKR 200-500 per bag depending on distance aur bag size, heavy ya extra large bags ka charge zyada ho sakta hai, tip additional hai aur aap ki marzi par based - typically PKR 100-300 appreciate ki jati hai, payment cash mein preferred hai. How to engage porter: simply approach uniformed porter jo usually entry par khara hota hai, clearly communicate karein kahan tak help chahiye (check-in tak ya gate tak), agree on price pehle if possible to avoid disputes later, ensure porter aap ki bags carefully handle kar raha hai aur aap ki nazar mein rahe. Security reminder: porter se kabhi apna bag unattended na chhodein, valuable items aur documents apne carry-on mein rakhein, phir bhi porter ko trust karein kyunki wo licensed professional hai.

Question: Airport ki free shuttle service hai kya?
Answer: Islamabad International Airport ki official internal shuttle service terminals ke beech currently limited hai kyunki airport ek main terminal structure hai. Lekin transportation options available hain: Within Airport Complex - moving walkways (travelators) long corridors mein installed hain jo aap ko walk karne mein assist karte hain especially agar gate door hai, golf carts ya electric vehicles kabhi available hain mobility-impaired passengers ya elderly ko transport karne ke liye on request. External Shuttle Services - kuch nearby hotels apni complimentary shuttle service offer karte hain guests ko airport se hotel tak le jane ke liye aur vice versa, is service ko use karne ke liye hotel se pehle confirm karein timings aur pickup location, hotel shuttle typically designated area se depart karti hai arrivals ke bahar. City Shuttle ya Bus Service - Islamabad aur Rawalpindi city tak public transport buses aur shuttles available hain fixed routes aur schedules par, prices affordable hain typically PKR 100-200 per person, schedule aur routes information desk par available hain. Private Transfer Services - pre-booked private car services aur app-based rides like Careem, Uber (agar available ho), hotel transfers jo charge karte hain but convenient hain. Parking Shuttle - long-term parking areas se terminal tak shuttle buses operate hoti hain regularly jo passengers ko unki cars se terminal tak le jati hain, yeh service typically free hai ya parking fee mein included. Free shuttle within terminal zones planned ho sakti hai future expansion mein jaise international airports mein hoti hai.

Question: Kya water fountain ya drinking water free hai?
Answer: Ji haan bilkul! Free drinking water fountains aur refill stations Islamabad International Airport ke terminal mein multiple locations par installed hain. Yeh facilities accessible hain poore terminal mein including: gate areas ke qareeb jahan passengers wait kar rahe hote hain, main seating zones mein, security checkpoint ke baad departure lounge mein, restrooms ke qareeb kai locations par. Water fountains provide karte hain: clean, filtered, safe drinking water jo quality standards meet karta hai, cold ya room temperature water typically, refill option for reusable water bottles jo eco-friendly hai aur plastic waste reduce karta hai. Yeh service especially valuable hai kyunki: security se pehle aap liquids nahi la sakte (throw karne parte hain), phir security ke baad aap free water fountain se apni bottle refill kar sakte hain, yeh paisa bachata hai kyunki bottled water airport par expensive hota hai (PKR 100-150 per bottle). Using water fountain: simply press button ya pedal, clean fresh water flow hoga, aap directly pee sakte hain ya reusable bottle fill kar sakte hain, fountain ki height adjustable ya multiple heights mein hoti hai adults aur children ke liye. Hygiene maintained hai aur fountains regularly cleaned aur inspected hote hain. Agar aap ko fountain dhoondhne mein mushkil hai, signage follow karein ya staff se directions poochein. Some restaurants bhi free water provide karte hain customers ko. Alternative: agar aap ko bottled water preference hai sealed security ke liye, to convenience stores se purchase kar sakte hain but free fountains perfectly safe aur convenient hain.

Question: Meeting point kahan hai airport par?
Answer: Designated meeting points Islamabad International Airport mein clearly marked areas hain jahan passengers apne family, friends, ya business contacts se mil sakte hain. Main meeting point arrivals hall mein waqe hai baggage claim area ke baad exit ke qareeb. Yeh area spacious hai with: visible signage jo 'Meeting Point' ya 'Meetup Area' indicate karta hai Urdu aur English mein, seating arrangements jahan aap wait kar sakte hain comfortably, good visibility so you can easily spot people arriving, close proximity to information desk for assistance agar zaroorat ho. Additional meetup locations: departure area mein security checkpoint se pehle ek general waiting area hai jahan non-travelers apne passengers ko drop off kar sakte hain aur short time wait kar sakte hain, food court area bhi popular meetup spot hai kyunki easy to locate aur refreshments available hain. Tips for successful meetup: clearly communicate the specific meeting point pehle text ya call se, landmark describe karein like 'main exit ke saamne wala pillar' ya 'information desk ke paas', time coordination important hai especially agar international flight hai jahan immigration aur customs time le sakta hai, phone charged rakhein aur local SIM ya roaming active ho coordination ke liye, patience rakhein kyunki airports mein crowds aur unexpected delays ho sakte hain. Agar flight arrival par meetup plan kar rahe hain: check flight status pehle to avoid long unnecessary wait, baggage claim usually 30-45 minutes leta hai to accordingly plan karein, passengers ko text karein jab wo land karein to update milta rahe. Meeting point par extended waiting possible hai lekin very long duration wait discouraged hai.

Question: Kya special assistance counter hai?
Answer: Ji haan, Special Assistance counter Islamabad International Airport mein available hai passengers ko various types of support provide karne ke liye. Yeh counter typically main departure hall mein check-in counters ke qareeb waqe hai with clear signage. Special Assistance services include: Wheelchair assistance for elderly, disabled, ya injury wale passengers - free service with trained staff, Meet and Assist service jo premium option hai where dedicated staff aap ko entry se gate tak ya arrival par aircraft se exit tak escort karta hai with all formalities, Priority boarding assistance for passengers with special needs, Unaccompanied minor service where staff bachon ki supervision karti hai who are traveling alone, Medical assistance coordination agar passenger ko health issues hain, Language assistance for passengers jo English ya Urdu nahi bolte, Baggage assistance for passengers jo heavy luggage handle nahi kar sakte. Service request karna: ideally advance booking karte waqt airline ko inform karein ke aap ko special assistance chahiye, ya arrival par airport par directly counter par request karein though advance notice better hai, staff will ask about specific requirements aur arrange accordingly, service typically free hai basic assistance ke liye though premium services chargeable ho sakti hain. Required information: type of assistance needed (wheelchair, medical, etc), flight details, passenger name aur contact, medical certificates agar applicable hon. Special Assistance counter staff trained hai handle various situations aur compassionate approach use karta hai. Agar aap ya aap ka family member special needs hai, don't hesitate to ask for help - airport yeh services isliye provide karti hai.

Question: Power bank charging kahan se mil sakta hai?
Answer: Dedicated power bank rental service Islamabad International Airport mein currently widely available nahi hai jaise kuch modern international airports mein hoti hai. Lekin power backup ke liye alternatives hain: Purchasing Power Bank - convenience stores aur electronics shops airport terminal mein portable power banks bechte hain, prices vary based on capacity typically PKR 1,500-5,000, advantage yeh hai ke aap apna own power bank aapke paas rehta hai future travels ke liye bhi, brands available may include local aur some international. Charging Stations Usage - jaise pehle mentioned, multiple free charging stations terminal mein hain USB ports aur power outlets ke sath, aap apna device yahan charge kar sakte hain jab tak aap wait kar rahe hain, though yeh stationary solution hai aur aap ko spot par rehna parta hai. Premium Lounge Facilities - agar aap lounge access rakhte hain, wahan ample charging facilities hain aur aap comfortable environment mein apne devices charge kar sakte hain, kuch lounges portable chargers lend bhi kar sakte hain temporary use ke liye on request. DIY Solution - apna own fully charged power bank home se le ayein in your carry-on baggage (check airline regulations for permitted capacity - usually up to 20,000mAh allowed), is se aap ko airport dependency nahi hogi. Restaurant/Cafe Charging - jab aap dining area mein khana kha rahe hain, aap table ke paas available outlets se charge kar sakte hain. Future mein self-service power bank rental kiosks install ho sakti hain like some airports have where you rent a power bank for few hours aur return it at another kiosk.

Question: Tourist information center kahan hai?
Answer: Dedicated tourist information center Islamabad International Airport mein limited form mein available hai but main information desk yeh role bhi perform karta hai. Main information desk central departure aur arrival areas mein waqe hai with knowledgeable staff. Tourist information services include: General Information - Islamabad aur Rawalpindi ke major attractions ke baare mein, popular tourist destinations Pakistan mein jaise Hunza, Murree, Swat, Nathia Gali, historical sites like Taxila, Lahore Fort, Mohenjo Daro; Transportation Guidance - how to reach city center from airport, taxi fares aur booking, bus routes aur schedules, car rental options; Accommodation Help - hotel recommendations for different budgets, booking assistance ya contacts, nearby accommodation for immediate need; Maps aur Brochures - free city maps, tourist pamphlets about local attractions, cultural information, travel guides (limited availability); Safety aur Travel Tips - local customs aur cultural etiquette, safe areas aur precautions, emergency contacts, weather information; Tour Packages - contacts for tour operators, day trip options from Islamabad, weekend getaway suggestions. Staff ki limitations: specialized detailed itinerary planning available nahi hai, booking services limited hain, current real-time information like traffic updates ya event happenings comprehensive nahi ho sakti. Alternative resources: bookshop airport mein travel guidebooks bechti hai Pakistan ke baare mein, free WiFi use karke aap online resources check kar sakte hain, hotel concierge services better detailed tourist information provide kar sakti hain, Pakistan Tourism Development Corporation (PTDC) ka website aur city office more comprehensive information source hai. Tourist info helpful hai quick queries ke liye lekin detailed trip planning advance online research ya professional travel agent se better hai.

Question: Airport mein kya kya shops hain?
Answer: Islamabad International Airport mein diverse shopping options available hain passengers ko various needs aur preferences ke liye. Main shopping areas security checkpoint ke dono taraf hain. Shops include: Duty-Free Shops - international brands perfumes, cosmetics, alcohol, tobacco (after security, international departures only), chocolates, electronics, fashion accessories; Souvenir aur Gift Shops - Pakistani handicrafts including pottery, miniature truck art, traditional textiles, embroidered items, gemstones aur jewelry, local sweets like sohan halwa, dry fruits aur nuts, books about Pakistan aur culture; Fashion aur Accessories - clothing brands, shoes aur bags, sunglasses aur watches, jewelry (gold, silver, artificial); Books aur Magazines - newspapers (local aur international), magazines (fashion, travel, business), novels aur bestsellers, travel guides aur maps, children's books aur coloring books; Electronics - mobile accessories, headphones aur earphones, chargers aur power banks, cameras aur gadgets, adapters aur converters; Convenience Stores - snacks aur beverages, travel essentials (toothbrush, toiletries), medicines (basic OTC), stationery; Specialty Items - prayer items (prayer mats, tasbeeh, Islamic books), sports items, toys for children. Shopping tips: prices airport mein city markets se generally higher hote hain, duty-free only beneficial hai for international travel, compare prices between shops kyunki variation ho sakta hai, payment methods - cash (PKR preferred) aur major credit/debit cards accepted, tax-free shopping international departures mein beneficial hai, bargaining generally not possible at fixed-price airport stores unlike local bazaars. Operating hours: most shops subah 6 baje se raat 11 baje tak khuli rehti hain but some 24 hours bhi. Shop staff usually English aur Urdu dono bol sakta hai.

Question: Luggage storage facility available hai kya?
Answer: Limited luggage storage ya left baggage facility Islamabad International Airport mein available hai but not as comprehensive as some international airports. Current options: Short-term Luggage Hold - kuch airlines apne passengers ko short-term bag storage allow karte hain agar long layover hai, is ke liye airline counter par poochna hoga aur policy airline-specific hai, charges apply ho sakte hain. Security Lockers - limited self-service lockers available ho sakte hain specific areas mein for small bags ya valuables, these are coin/card operated aur hourly basis par charge hote hain, locker sizes limited hain to large suitcases fit nahi ho sakte. Nearby Hotel Storage - agar aap kisi qareeb hotel se early checkout lete hain ya late check-in karenge, to hotel usually complimentary luggage storage offer karta hai apne guests ko, yeh option convenient hai agar aap city explore karna chahte hain bags ke baghar. Third-party Services - kuch independent luggage storage services city mein available hain jo airport se thoda door hain but pickup/delivery arrange kar sakte hain for a fee, yeh services online bookable hain advance mein. Important Considerations: security concerns ki wajah se airports baggage storage ko strictly regulate karti hain, all stored baggage security screening se guzarta hai, maximum storage duration limited hota hai usually 24-48 ghante, charges weight aur size par based hote hain typically PKR 500-1000 per bag per day, valuable items aur prohibited items storage mein accept nahi hoti, claim karte waqt original receipt aur ID zaruri hai. Agar aap long layover plan kar rahe hain aur bags store karna chahte hain, advance mein options research karein aur airline se bhi poochein. Alternative solution yeh hai ke aap hotel book karein even just for few hours jo luggage storage automatically include karta hai.

Question: Kya airport par SIM card mil sakta hai?
Answer: Ji haan, SIM card purchase karna Islamabad International Airport par possible hai international travelers ke liye jo Pakistan mein mobile connectivity chahte hain. SIM card outlets arrival area mein aur terminal ke main area mein available hain. Pakistan ke major telecom operators: Jazz (largest network with good coverage), Zong (4G network good in cities), Telenor (reliable service), Ufone (decent coverage). SIM purchase process: visit telecom operator kiosk airport par, passport copy aur one passport-size photo zaruri hai (biometric verification ke liye), kuch operators on-spot photo le lete hain, registration process typically 15-30 minutes, SIM immediately activate ho jata hai ya few hours mein. Available packages: prepaid tourist packages specially designed for visitors with data, calls, SMS, prices vary PKR 500-2000 depending on validity period aur data allocation, typical package includes 10-30 GB data, unlimited local calls, validity 7-30 days. Benefits of local SIM: cheaper than international roaming significantly, better network coverage locally, easy to recharge from any shop, useful for local calls (hotels, taxis, restaurants). Important notes: SIM registration compulsory hai Pakistan mein under biometric verification, agar aap apna own phone use kar rahe hain to ensure it's unlocked, 4G LTE widely available in cities but rural areas may have 3G, bring passport always jab SIM purchase ya verify karwa rahe hain. Recharge options: scratch cards available at any mobile shop, online recharge through banking apps, automated recharge through USSD codes. Airport SIM prices might be slightly higher than city rates lekin convenience worth hai especially agar aap immediately connectivity chahte hain. Staff usually English bol sakta hai aur process explain kar sakta hai.

Question: Kya travel insurance airport se mil sakti hai?
Answer: Travel insurance desks ya counters Islamabad International Airport par limited availability mein hain. Insurance options: Airport Insurance Counters - kuch insurance companies ki desks departure area mein available ho sakti hain offering last-minute travel insurance, yeh typically short-term policies hain covering flight duration aur immediate travel period, staff English aur Urdu dono mein assist kar sakta hai, instant policy issuance with immediate coverage. Online Purchase - airport ki free WiFi use karke aap online travel insurance purchase kar sakte hain apne smartphone se, various Pakistani insurance companies websites offer instant policies, payment credit/debit card se, policy documents email par immediately receive ho jate hain. Types of Coverage Available: Trip cancellation aur interruption (flight delays, cancellations), Medical emergencies during travel, Baggage loss, theft ya damage, Personal accident coverage, Emergency evacuation. Important Considerations: airport se last-minute insurance costly ho sakta hai compared to advance online purchase, coverage limits check karein especially medical coverage amount jo international travel ke liye adequate hona chahiye, read policy terms carefully especially exclusions, pre-existing medical conditions usually covered nahi hote, high-risk activities (adventure sports) may require additional premium. Recommendation: ideally travel insurance advance mein online ya bank se purchase karein jo cost-effective aur comprehensive coverage deti hai, lekin agar aap bhool gaye to airport option better than traveling uninsured especially international trips ke liye, kuch credit cards complimentary travel insurance offer karte hain agar aap ticket us card se purchase karein. Insurance agent se sawal poochein clearly samajhne ke liye kya covered hai aur kya nahi.

Question: Mera flight delay ho gaya, kya facilities hain?
Answer: Flight delay ki surat mein Islamabad International Airport passengers ko support provide karta hai though facilities airline policies par depend karti hain. Delay compensation aur facilities: Airline Responsibility - under aviation regulations, airlines responsible hain delay facilities provide karne ke, short delays (1-2 hours) - usually refreshment vouchers, medium delays (2-4 hours) - meal vouchers aur lounge access possible, long delays (4+ hours) - hotel accommodation agar overnight, especially for international flights. Airport Facilities Available - waiting lounges with comfortable seating (free for all), multiple charging stations to keep devices powered, free WiFi to stay connected aur informed, food court aur restaurants (you may need to pay unless airline provides vouchers), shops aur duty-free for browsing, prayer rooms aur restrooms. What to do during delay: Check with airline counter immediately for updated information aur compensation options, keep boarding pass aur ID handy, stay near gate area for announcements, don't leave terminal agar compensation chahiye, collect vouchers agar airline provide kar rahi hai, use time productively - work, read, relax, walk around terminal to stretch. Passenger Rights: right to information about delay reason aur expected departure, right to refreshments aur accommodation as per airline policy aur delay duration, right to refund ya alternate flight booking agar delay excessive hai aur aap cancel karna chahte hain. Long Delay Options: agar delay 6+ hours hai aur aap city jana chahte hain, ensure ke aap check-in counter se re-entry ka confirmation le lein, return to airport well before revised departure time, remember security screening phir se hogi. Keep calm aur patient rahein, airport staff aur airline representatives assist karenge.

Question: Airport par Qibla ki direction kaise pata karun?
Answer: Qibla (Kaaba ki direction Mecca mein) ki sahi direction Islamabad International Airport par maloom karne ke multiple tareeqay hain: Prayer Rooms - Dedicated namaz ke kamray jo doosri manzil par Gate 5 ke qareeb hain specifically Qibla direction facing built kiye gaye hain, walls par clear arrows aur signs hain jo Makkah Mukarrama ki taraf point karte hain, carpets par lines bhi hain jo proper alignment mein help karti hain, from Islamabad, Qibla direction approximately West ki taraf hai. Information Desk - staff members Qibla direction guide kar sakte hain agar aap namaz room ke bahar kisi aur jagah namaz ada karna chahte hain, wo generally aware hote hain local Qibla orientation ke baare mein. Smartphone Apps - aap apne mobile par Qibla finder apps use kar sakte hain jo compass aur GPS use karte hain, popular apps include: 'Muslim Pro', 'Qibla Compass', 'Athan', free airport WiFi ya mobile data se yeh apps accurately direction dikha sakti hain. Physical Compass - agar aap traditional compass rakhte hain, Islamabad se Qibla approximately 270 degrees (due West with slight variation) hai. General Airport Orientation - terminal building ki layout aur structure se familiar hone ke baad, aap approximate Western direction determine kar sakte hain. Prayer Times Display - namaz ke kamron mein namaz ke timings ke sath Qibla direction bhi display hoti hai. Remember: agar aap ko exact direction ke baare mein doubt hai, namaz room use karna sabse asaan aur confirmed tareeqa hai jahan sab kuch properly aligned hai. Mushkil situation mein best effort acceptable hai Islamic teachings ke mutabiq.

Question: Kids play area mein entry free hai ya charges hain?
Answer: Kids play area Islamabad International Airport mein completely FREE hai tamam passengers ke liye, koi entry charges nahi hain. Yeh family-friendly facility airport dwara provide ki jati hai passenger comfort aur convenience ke liye especially families with young children. Details about free access: No Registration Required - simply walk into the play area with your children, no prior booking ya registration necessary, play area Gate 5 ke qareeb waqe hai easily accessible location par. Age Restrictions - area typically 2-10 years ke bachon ke liye designed hai, younger infants bhi accompany kar sakte hain with close parental supervision, older children allowed hain if they're respectful aur gentle chhote bachon ke sath. Rules aur Guidelines - parent ya guardian ka supervision mandatory hai, children should remove shoes before entering soft play area, no food or drinks inside play equipment (designated eating area outside), maintain cleanliness aur don't damage equipment, time limit may be imposed during peak hours agar area crowded hai, sharing aur taking turns encouraged hai. Operating Hours - generally 6 AM se 10 PM tak khula rehta hai, timing may vary depending on flight schedules aur maintenance needs, closed temporarily for cleaning breaks. Safety Measures - padded flooring throughout, safety standards maintained, cleaning regularly done especially after busy periods, first aid available through nearby airport medical center. Facilities adjacent to play area: seating for parents, charging stations for devices, lockers for keeping shoes aur small bags, restrooms nearby including baby changing facilities. Yeh free facility airport ka family-friendly approach demonstrate karti hai making travel with children less stressful. Agar area bahut crowded hai to off-peak timings mein visit karein better experience ke liye.

Question: Passport lost ho gaya airport par, kya karun?
Answer: Passport lost hone par immediately action lena bohot zaruri hai especially agar aap international flight catch karni hai. Emergency steps: Immediate Actions - jahan last dekha wahan check karein thoroughly, retrace your steps in terminal, check restrooms, restaurants, shops where you visited, ask staff at those locations agar unhone dekha ya kisi ne submit kiya. Report to Authorities - immediately Lost and Found office ko report karein with detailed description, report to Airport Security office with your details, agar aap Pakistani citizen hain to nearest police post par FIR register karwayein. Contact Your Embassy/Consulate - agar aap foreign national hain, apne country ki embassy ya consulate Islamabad mein contact karein immediately, wo emergency travel document issue kar sakte hain, embassy contact numbers information desk se mil sakti hain ya online available hain. For Pakistani Citizens - NADRA office ya designated counter airport par ja sakti hai (availability confirm karein), emergency passport issuance possible hai but time-consuming ho sakta hai, original CNIC aur flight booking evidence helpful hoga. Airline Coordination - apni airline ko situation explain karein, wo possibly flight reschedule kar sakti hai agar documents ke liye time chahiye, some flexibility possible hai emergencies mein lekin charges apply ho sakte hain. Required Information to Report - your full name, passport number (agar yaad hai ya copy hai), issue aur expiry date, photo agar available ho, last location where you had it, description of passport cover agar distinctive hai. Preventive Measures Future Ke Liye - always keep photocopy of passport separately, save scanned copy in email/cloud, use passport holder with secure attachment, keep passport in front pocket or secure bag, immediately report if lost. Airport staff aur security helpful hain such situations mein, don't panic aur systematically address the issue.

Question: Airport mein free newspaper ya magazine mil sakta hai?
Answer: Limited free reading materials Islamabad International Airport mein available hain specific locations par. Premium lounge mein complimentary newspapers aur magazines rakhay jatay hain members aur guests ke liye including local Pakistani newspapers (Dawn, Express Tribune, Urdu dailies), international newspapers (sometimes limited copies), business magazines, travel magazines, lifestyle magazines. Information desk par free tourist brochures aur pamphlets about Pakistan available hain. Kuch airline lounges specific to their business/first class passengers bhi reading material offer karte hain. General terminal area mein free newspapers typically available nahi hoti. For purchase: newsstand ya bookshop terminal mein latest newspapers aur magazines bechta hai including local, national aur limited international publications, prices standard retail rates par ya slightly higher, English aur Urdu dono mein options available. Digital alternatives: free airport WiFi use karke aap online news websites access kar sakte hain, many newspapers offer free digital editions ya apps, e-magazines bhi readable hain tablets ya smartphones par. Waiting areas mein kabhi kabhi yesterday's newspapers chhori hui mil sakti hain jo passengers ne read karke chhod di hain. Overall, free print reading material limited hai unless aap lounge access rakhte hain, but digital content freely accessible hai WiFi ke through.

Question: Kya airport mein conference room book kar sakte hain?
Answer: Limited conference aur meeting room facilities Islamabad International Airport ke premium lounge mein available hain as part of business center. Yeh meeting spaces suitable hain for: small business meetings 2-6 people ke liye, conference calls aur video conferences, private discussions away from crowded terminal. Booking process: meeting rooms access usually lounge access ke sath included hai, some may require advance reservation especially during busy business hours, contact lounge reception directly ya through airline, charges may apply based on duration aur room size agar aap separately book kar rahe hain without lounge membership. Facilities typically include: private ya semi-private enclosed space, comfortable seating around table, WiFi connectivity, power outlets for laptops aur charging, basic AV equipment (projector, TV screen) may be available, whiteboard ya flipchart for presentations, natural ya good artificial lighting, quiet environment away from terminal noise. Duration limits: usually 1-3 hours ke slots depending on availability aur booking terms. Not available for: large conferences, all-day events (better suited for hotel conference rooms), events requiring extensive setup. Larger business events: nearby airport hotels offer comprehensive conference facilities with catering options, audio-visual equipment, greater capacity seating. Alternative workspace: agar small meeting chahiye informal, food court ya cafe mein quiet corner table use kar sakte hain, though privacy limited hogi, lounge general seating area bhi work discussions ke liye suitable hai agar dedicated room nahi chahiye.

Question: Airport se city center tak taxi ka fare kitna hai?
Answer: Islamabad International Airport se city center (Blue Area, F-6, F-7 etc) tak taxi fare approximately PKR 2,000-3,000 hai depending on exact destination, time of day, aur taxi service type. Fare details: Airport Taxi Stand - official airport taxis metered hain aur more reliable, fare structure: PKR 1,500-2,000 for central Islamabad (20-25 km), PKR 2,500-3,500 for Rawalpindi city (30 km), PKR 1,000-1,500 for nearby areas like Bahria Town or DHA, night charges (10 PM-6 AM) typically 20-30% higher, toll charges additional agar motorway use hoti hai (around PKR 100-150). App-Based Rides - Careem widely available, sometimes Uber (check availability), fares usually competitive ya slightly lower than airport taxis, surge pricing may apply during peak hours ya bad weather, advance booking possible through apps, payment cash ya card dono se possible. Private Car Services - pre-booked luxury cars available at higher rates PKR 3,500-5,000, advantage: English-speaking drivers, cleaner newer vehicles, fixed rates with no hidden charges, some hotels offer complimentary airport pickup for guests. Fare negotiation: meter use karne ki insist karein ya fixed fare agree karein before starting journey, get receipt for your records, if driver refuses meter, take another taxi. Journey time: typically 30-45 minutes to central Islamabad depending on traffic, Rawalpindi 45-60 minutes, early morning ya late night faster hai. Tips: have small bills kyunki drivers may not have change for large notes, confirm destination clearly - area name, sector number, landmark, keep luggage in sight while loading, share trip details with family member for safety.

Question: Kya public bus service airport se available hai?
Answer: Ji haan, public bus service Islamabad International Airport se city tak available hai economical option ke tor par though less convenient than taxis. Bus services: Metro Bus Service - route jo Islamabad city ko connect karti hai partially airport ke qareeb se guzarti hai, aap ko airport se feeder service ya taxi se metro station tak jana par sakta hai (nearby Koral station), metro ticket PKR 20-50 depending on distance, bus service modern aur AC hai. Public Buses - regular public transport buses Islamabad aur Rawalpindi ko connect karti hain, bus stop airport road par available hai walking distance mein ya short taxi ride, fare PKR 50-100 depending on route, buses frequent hain lekin fixed schedule nahi hota always, luggage space limited hai to heavy bags ke sath mushkil ho sakti hai. Timing aur frequency: buses early morning 6 AM se start hoti hain, raat 10-11 PM tak chalti hain typically, frequency 15-30 minutes depending on time of day aur route. Considerations: public transport time-consuming ho sakti hai compared to direct taxi (1.5-2 hours vs 30-45 minutes), stops multiple hain to journey longer, agar aap ke paas heavy luggage hai ya family hai to taxi zyada practical, good budget option for solo travelers with light luggage. Alternative economical options: shared van services jo multiple passengers ko city drop karte hain, splitting taxi fare with other passengers going same direction. Information: airport information desk par bus routes aur timings ki updated information available hai, signage bus stop ki direction indicate karta hai. Security considerations: public transport mein apne belongings ka khyal rakhein, valuables apne sight mein rakhein.

Question: Kya airport mein capsule hotel ya sleeping pods hain?
Answer: Nahi, Islamabad International Airport mein capsule hotel ya dedicated sleeping pods currently available nahi hain unlike some modern international airports. Rest options jo available hain: Premium Lounge - comfortable reclining chairs aur quiet zones where you can rest during layover, some lounges have designated rest areas with dimmed lighting, not full beds but more comfortable than regular terminal seating, access through lounge membership, business class ticket, ya day pass. Regular Terminal Seating - padded seats without armrests at some locations allow lying down to some extent, prayer rooms have carpeted floors where respectfully resting allowed hai if not crowded, quieter upper-level areas may offer better rest opportunities away from main traffic. Nearby Airport Hotels - within 5-10 minutes drive several hotels offer day-use rooms ya short-stay packages specifically for layover passengers, prices PKR 3,000-8,000 for few hours, facilities include bed, shower, WiFi, peaceful environment, some hotels provide free airport shuttle. Future development: jaise airport expand aur modernize hota rahega, sleeping pods ya transit hotels add ho sakti hain like international standards. Long layover tips: if you have 6+ hours layover aur hotel room book karna budget mein hai, it's worth it for proper rest, otherwise premium lounge best option hai, lying on regular seats possible hai but not very comfortable aur security of belongings ka concern hai, stay near your gate aur set alarm agar rest kar rahe hain to ensure you don't miss announcements. Some passengers apne own travel pillows aur light blankets carry karte hain comfort ke liye.

Question: Visa on arrival counter airport par hai kya?
Answer: Visa on Arrival facility Pakistan mein selected nationalities ke liye available hai Islamabad International Airport par. Important information: Eligible Countries - currently limited nationalities ke liye available hai, list frequently update hoti hai so check karna zaruri hai apne travel se pehle, usually business travelers aur tourism purposes ke liye. Visa on Arrival Counter Location - immigration area mein arrivals hall se pehle dedicated counter hai clearly marked with signage, counter 24/7 operational hai international flights ke sath sync. Application Process - arrival par counter par jayein, required documents submit karein: valid passport (minimum 6 months validity), return ticket ya onward journey ticket, hotel booking confirmation, financial means ka proof (credit card, cash), 2 passport-size photos, completed visa application form (form counter par available hai), visa fee payment (credit card ya foreign currency usually accepted, PKR bhi), processing time typically 30-60 minutes depending on rush. Alternative: E-Visa System - Pakistan ki electronic visa system online application allow karti hai advance mein, yeh zyada convenient hai kyunki aap pehle approval le lete hain, arrival par simple stamping process hoti hai, processing time 2-5 business days typically, same website se apply kar sakte hain: visa.nadra.gov.pk. Categories Available - tourist visa (validity 30 days usually), business visa (longer validity possible), transit visa (very short stay). Not available for: certain nationalities completely (check official list), passengers without proper documentation, red-flagged individuals. Recommendations: e-visa advance mein apply karna better hai to avoid uncertainty aur airport waiting time, keep all documents organized aur ready, agar confusion hai to Pakistan embassy in your country se confirm karein eligibility. Arrival counter par staff usually English-speaking hai aur assist kar sakta hai.

Question: Airport par rent a car service kahan se milti hai?
Answer: Car rental services Islamabad International Airport par available hain multiple providers ke through. Rental counters ka location: arrivals area mein baggage claim ke baad several car rental company counters hain, departure terminal ke main area mein bhi kuch operators desks maintain karte hain. Available Companies: Local Pakistani rental companies - typically more affordable, good local knowledge aur support, possibly international brands bhi depending on partnerships. Rental process: approach counter with requirements, documents needed: valid driving license (Pakistani ya International Driving Permit for foreigners), passport ya CNIC for ID verification, credit card for security deposit (typically hold PKR 10,000-50,000 depending on car type), booking reference agar online advance booking ki hai. Vehicle options: economy cars (PKR 3,000-5,000 per day), sedans (PKR 5,000-8,000 per day), SUVs (PKR 8,000-15,000 per day), luxury vehicles (PKR 15,000+ per day), with driver service bhi available hai additional charges ke sath (recommended if unfamiliar with local driving conditions). Rental terms: minimum age usually 21-25 years, insurance typically included in rate (check coverage details), fuel policy: usually full-to-full (return with same fuel level), mileage: some packages have daily limits, others unlimited, additional driver charges apply agar multiple drivers, GPS available on request (may cost extra). Booking tips: advance online booking often better rates deta hai, peak season mein advance booking recommended kyunki availability limited ho sakti hai, compare rates across multiple providers, clarify all charges upfront including insurance, fuel, tolls, ki driver ko city roads ka knowledge hai ya GPS chahiye. Driving in Pakistan: traffic can be chaotic especially for foreigners, driving with experienced local driver recommended, left-side driving, some toll roads on motorways. Return procedure: return time strictly adhere karein to avoid extra day charges, fuel tank same level par, vehicle inspection hoga for any damage.

Question: Airport mein koi entertainment ya recreation facilities hain?
Answer: Entertainment aur recreation facilities Islamabad International Airport mein limited hain but kuch options available hain long waits ko bearable banane ke liye. Available entertainment: Kids Play Area - Gate 5 ke qareeb dedicated play zone for children 2-10 years, free entry, parents can supervise while children play, keeps families entertained. TV Screens - multiple screens throughout terminal displaying news channels, sports, some entertainment content, seating areas near screens allow watching while waiting. Free WiFi - high-speed internet access allows streaming movies, series, music on personal devices, YouTube, Netflix (if you have subscription), social media browsing, online games. Shops aur Window Shopping - browsing through duty-free, souvenirs, fashion stores can be time-pass, trying perfumes, looking at gadgets, books browsing in bookshop. Reading Material - bookshop mein magazines, novels, newspapers purchase kar ke read kar sakte hain, some areas have comfortable seating for reading. Food Court - dining experience itself entertainment ban sakti hai, trying different foods, chai pe gup-shup with travel companions. Premium Lounge - agar access hai to lounges have better entertainment: comfortable seating with personal TVs sometimes, magazines aur newspapers, peaceful environment for rest ya work. Walking - terminal architecture explore karna, people watching, photography (where allowed), window views of aircraft aur runway. Missing facilities (not commonly available): video game arcades, movie theaters, fitness centers, full-service spa, museum ya art installations. DIY entertainment: bring your own entertainment like books, tablets loaded with content, music playlist, puzzles, card games if with family, download movies/shows before arriving at airport using mobile data. Suggestion: long layovers ke liye city tour plan kar sakte hain agar time sufficient hai (6+ hours), explore Islamabad's attractions like Faisal Mosque, Daman-e-Koh, local markets. Terminal walking for exercise aur stretching bhi healthy activity hai after sitting in plane.

Question: Flight information display screens kahan hain?
Answer: Flight Information Display Screens (FIDS) Islamabad International Airport ke poore terminal mein strategically placed hain real-time flight updates provide karne ke liye. Screen locations: Main Departure Hall - large display boards entry ke baad prominent position par, all departing flights ki comprehensive list with status, Gate Areas - each gate section ke qareeb dedicated screens showing relevant flights for that area, highlighting imminent departures, Check-in Area - screens above check-in counters displaying which counter is serving which flight, Security Checkpoints - before aur after security areas mein updated departure information, Arrival Hall - showing incoming flights ka status, baggage carousel numbers, delays. Display information includes: Flight number aur airline, Destination city, Scheduled departure/arrival time, Actual departure/arrival time, Current status (On Time, Delayed, Boarding, Departed, Cancelled), Gate number, Check-in counter number, Baggage belt number (for arrivals). Color coding: green usually indicates on-time, yellow may show slight delay, red for significant issues. Screen refresh rate: automatically update hoti hai har few minutes, critical changes like gate changes immediately reflect. Accessibility: screens readable height par installed with clear fonts, multilingual display - English aur sometimes Urdu. What to do: gate information change ho sakti hai last minute so regular monitoring zaruri hai, always cross-check with boarding pass, agar confusion hai to staff ya information desk se confirm karein, mobile apps bhi flight status track karte hain as backup, announcements audio system par bhi hoti hain important updates ke liye. Tips: gate se at least 30-40 minutes pehle pahunch jayein, gate changes quickly ho sakte hain so vigilant rahein, photograph boarding pass aur gate info as reference.

Question: Kya airport par printing aur photocopying facility hai?
Answer: Printing aur photocopying facilities Islamabad International Airport par limited availability mein hain lekin accessible hain agar zaroorat ho. Main facilities: Premium Lounge Business Center - comprehensive printing, photocopying, scanning services, multiple computers with internet access aur MS Office, high-quality printers (color aur B&W), charges minimal ya complimentary lounge members ke liye, staff assistance available for complex jobs.
